description.schinese: 为任意职业的全部5个遗物标记金星

description.english: Complete a standard run as Ninja without learning any Clan Talents
description.schinese: 作为忍者，在不学习任何部族天赋的情况下，完成标准的一局游戏

description.english: Have a Basic Attack pass through 5 Prisms as Ninja
description.schinese: 作为忍者，让一次基础攻击穿过5个棱镜

description.english: Learn an Ultimate Ability as Ninja
description.schinese: 作为忍者学习一项终极技能

description.english: Create 5000 Soulflames as Ninja
description.schinese: 作为忍者制造5000个灵魂火焰

description.english: Enter a Portal before Night 10 as Ninja
description.schinese: 作为忍者在第10夜之前进入一个传送门

description.english: Have 12 or more Shurikens in your Clip as Ninja
description.schinese: 在你的忍者弹夹中装有至少12支手里剑

description.english: Complete all 6 Ninja Challenges
description.schinese: 完成全部6项忍者挑战

description.english: Survive 120 seconds in the Eternal Nightmare as Ninja
description.schinese: 作为忍者在永恒恶梦中存活120秒

description.english: Complete Mastery 25 as Ninja
description.schinese: 作为忍者完成专精等级25级

description.english: Survive Night 30 in Endless Mode as Ninja
description.schinese: 作为忍者在无尽模式中活过第30夜

displayName.schinese: 带上我的手里剑 [暗影敌潮]

description.english: Raise Ninja's class level to 15
description.schinese: 将忍者的职业等级提高到15级

description.english: Unlock the Shiny Ninja Skin in Nightshade Grove
description.schinese: 在夜影树林解锁闪亮忍者皮肤

description.english: Learn a Mythic Talent
description.schinese: 学习一项神话天赋

description.english: Complete a run with a Chromaprism active
description.schinese: 在启用一项异色的情况下完成一局游戏

description.english: Build the Robot in the Build-A-Beast Factory Environment
description.schinese: 在野兽制造工坊环境中建造机器人

description.english: Fire 1000 shots with Ghost Pistols as Bandit
description.schinese: 作为强盗使用幽灵手枪射击1000发

description.english: Complete a run on Mastery 35
description.schinese: 以专精35级完成一局游戏

description.english: Upgrade an Ability
description.schinese: 升级一项技能

description.english: Upgrade an Ability with a Legendary Upgrade
description.schinese: 使用传奇升级来升级一项技能

description.english: Kill 100 Glitched Elites
description.schinese: 击杀100名故障精英

description.english: Complete your first run of Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 完成你的试炼模式第一局

description.english: Complete Floor 2 of Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 完成试炼模式的第2层

description.english: Complete Floor 3 of Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 完成试炼模式的第3层

description.english: Complete Floor 4 of Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 完成试炼模式的第4层

description.english: Complete Floor 5 of Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 完成试炼模式的第5层

description.english: Complete Gauntlet Mode without using any Consumables
description.schinese: 在不使用任何消耗品的情况下完成试炼模式

description.english: Survive a Night with a Blazing Badge active in Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 在试炼模式下，激活炽焰徽章存活一夜

description.english: Survive a Night with an Inferno Badge active in Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 在试炼模式下，激活地狱徽章存活一夜

description.english: Use a Legendary Consumable in Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 在试炼模式中使用一件传奇消耗品

description.english: Use 3 Consumables between two Combat Encounters in Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 在试炼模式的两次遭遇战之间使用3件消耗品

description.english: Choose 25 Enemy Badges in a single Night in Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 在试炼模式中在一个夜晚选择25个敌人徽章

description.english: Defeat 1000 enemies in a single Night in Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 在试炼模式中在一个夜晚击败1000名敌人

description.english: Defeat a Threat Boss in Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 在试炼模式中击败一个死敌头目

description.english: Defeat an Anomaly Boss in Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 在试炼模式中击败一个异常头目

description.english: Reroll the same Talent Choice 5 times in Gauntlet Mode
description.schinese: 在试炼模式中重刷出相同的天赋选择5次

description.english: Unlock a Shiny Skin using a Chromogem
description.schinese: 使用异色宝石解锁闪亮皮肤

description.english: Unlock 5 Shiny Skins using Chromogems
description.schinese: 使用异色宝石解锁5个闪亮皮肤

description.english: Unlock 10 Shiny Skins using Chromogems
description.schinese: 使用异色宝石解锁10个闪亮皮肤

description.english: Unlock 20 Shiny Skins using Chromogems
description.schinese: 使用异色宝石解锁20个闪亮皮肤

description.english: Control a full team of 4 Pets as Beastmaster
description.schinese: 作为驯兽师控制一整队4只宠物

description.english: Evolve a Pet to maximum level as Beastmaster
description.schinese: 作为驯兽师将一只宠物进化到最高等级

description.english: Toss 500 Objects as Beastmaster
description.schinese: 作为驯兽师投掷500件物品

description.english: Feed a Hungry Pet as Beastmaster
description.schinese: 作为驯兽师喂养一只饥饿的宠物

description.english: Protect all 4 Eggs in the Unhatched Challenge as Beastmaster
description.schinese: 作为驯兽师在“未孵化”挑战中保护全部4个蛋

description.english: Collect all 8 Beastmaster Pets
description.schinese: 收集全部8只驯兽师宠物

description.english: Complete all 6 Beastmaster Challenges
description.schinese: 完成全部6项驯兽师挑战

description.english: Survive 120 seconds in the Eternal Nightmare as Beastmaster
description.schinese: 作为驯兽师在永恒恶梦中存活120秒

description.english: Complete Mastery 25 as Beastmaster
description.schinese: 作为忍者完成专精等级25级

description.english: Survive Night 30 in Endless Mode as Beastmaster
description.schinese: 作为驯兽师在无尽模式中活过第30夜

description.english: Unlock the Original Shiny Beastmaster Skin in The Training Grounds
description.schinese: 在训练场地解锁原初闪亮驯兽师皮肤

description.english: Raise Beastmaster's class level to 15
description.schinese: 将驯兽师的职业等级提高到15级
